casebody.data:
2002-1885 (La. 10/14/02)

Frances HILTON v. CITY OF CARENCO, et al. Frances Hilton v. Barry D. Ehrmann, et al. No. 2002-CC-1885. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Hilton, Frances; — Plaintiff; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Lafayette, 15th Judicial District Court Div. L, Nos. 2000-1159, 2000-2609; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. C 02-00746.

Denied.

WEIMER, J., would grant the writ.
